subject: RE: Mocking classes (was RE: [junit] About mock object :!)
msgSnippet: ... Another way to mock an object is the following: Stupid! You don t fulfill your contract! You re gonna be Fowlered as soon as I get round to it! etc.
messageBody:
At 10:35 AM 23/08/01, you wrote:
>The other way to do it is to use a factory. Always pass the factory to
>each object in the app that needs to create other objects.


Another way to mock an object is the following:
"Stupid! You don't fulfill your contract! You're gonna be Fowlered as soon
as I get round to it!"

etc.

Sorry. It's been a long day, and it ain't anywhere nearly over yet...

Jim
